description: Source files for the AppGateway plugin implementation, including core classes and resolver components for the plugin architecture.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class representing the AppGateway plugin, managing plugin interactions and lifecycle.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation details of the AppGateway class, handles core functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Handles responder logic within the AppGateway plugin, managing incoming requests.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Component responsible for resolving dependencies or resources within the plugin system.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Represents the module component in the plugin architecture, responsible for initialization and registration.

methods.name: AppGateway::initialize
methods.description: Initializes the AppGateway plugin, setting up necessary resources.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::handleRequest
methods.description: Handles incoming requests to the plugin responder.

methods.name: Resolver::resolve
methods.description: Resolves dependencies or resources required by the plugin.

methods.name: Module::start
methods.description: Starts the module, performing registration and startup routines.
